entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries or a few rain showers ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023
